name: UI Kit
description:
Sorry that the plugin is not working now, as sime time if fix.

Thank you very much and I would like it before the reviews and suggestions and I have any ideas about function.


This plugin make a previews for the fonts and colors used on the layouts or from your styles.

By default it used "local styles" but you can use "from layouts" option.


** Be careful with the "from layouts" option, it can be slow and pause the interface for a while

* For generate "from layouts" an additional option is also available, for skip elements with color "#4C4C4C" (default color for figma shapes)
